member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.BooleanObservableExtensions.SubscribeOpenClosed(System.IObservable{System.Boolean},System.Action,System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes actions to be executed when the observable emits true (open) or false (closed).

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.BooleanObservableExtensions.SubscribeOpen(System.IObservable{System.Boolean},System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes an action to be executed when the observable emits true (open).

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.BooleanObservableExtensions.SubscribeClosed(System.IObservable{System.Boolean},System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes an action to be executed when the observable emits true (closed).

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.BooleanObservableExtensions.SubscribeOnOff(System.IObservable{System.Boolean},System.Action,System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes actions to be executed when the observable emits true (on) or false (off).

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.BooleanObservableExtensions.SubscribeOn(System.IObservable{System.Boolean},System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes an action to be executed when the observable emits true (on).

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.BooleanObservableExtensions.SubscribeOff(System.IObservable{System.Boolean},System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes an action to be executed when the observable emits false (off).

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.SubscribeOpenClosed(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.Action,System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes actions to be executed on the open or closed state of an entity. Initial state is also taken into account, meaning an action might execute immediately if the entity is currently open or closed.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.SubscribeOpen(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes actions to be executed on the open state of an entity. Initial state is also taken into account, meaning the action might execute immediately if the entity is currently open.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.SubscribeClosed(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes actions to be executed on the closed state of an entity. Initial state is also taken into account, meaning the action might execute immediately if the entity is currently closed.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.SubscribeOnOff(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.Action,System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes actions to be executed on the on or off state of an entity. Initial state is also taken into account, meaning an action might execute immediately if the entity is currently on or off.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.SubscribeOn(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes actions to be executed on the on state of an entity. Initial state is also taken into account, meaning the action might execute immediately if the entity is currently on.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.SubscribeOff(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes actions to be executed on the off state of an entity. Initial state is also taken into account, meaning the action might execute immediately if the entity is currently off.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.SubscribeTrueFalse(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.Action,System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes actions to be executed on the on or off state of an entity. Initial state is also taken into account, meaning an action might execute immediately if the entity is currently on or off.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.SubscribeTrueFalse(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.Action,System.Action,System.Func{NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.EntityState,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Subscribes actions to be executed on the result of the predicate applied to the state of an entity. Predicate will be evaluated on all state changes, including attribute changes. A null entity state (typically received when an entity is removed) is filtered out so the predicate doesn't have to handle null values. Initial state is also taken into account, meaning an action might execute immediately.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.SubscribeTrueFalse``3(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity{``0,``1,``2},System.Action,System.Action,System.Func{``1,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Subscribes actions to be executed on the result of the predicate applied to the state of an entity. Predicate will be evaluated on all state changes, including attribute changes. A null entity state (typically received when an entity is removed) is filtered out so the predicate doesn't have to handle null values. Initial state is also taken into account, meaning an action might execute immediately.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.SubscribeTrue(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes actions to be executed on the on state of an entity. Initial state is also taken into account, meaning the action might execute immediately if the entity is currently on.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.SubscribeFalse(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes actions to be executed on the off state of an entity. Initial state is also taken into account, meaning the action might execute immediately if the entity is currently off.

summary.para: Returns a boolean observable that emits true when the entity opens and emits false when the entity closes. The observable is distinct until changed. Other state changes are ignored.

State changes other than open or closed (on or off on the entity) are ignored. This also includes a null entity state. This is typically received when an entity is removed. This will not be emitted in the observable.
Returns a boolean observable that emits true when the entity turns on and emits false when the entity turns off. The observable is distinct until changed. Other state changes are ignored.
State changes other than on or off are ignored. This also includes a null entity state. This is typically received when an entity is removed. This will not be emitted in the observable.
Returns a boolean observable that emits true when the entity turns on and emits false when the entity turns off. The observable is distinct until changed. Other state changes are ignored.
State changes other than on or off are ignored. This also includes a null entity state. This is typically received when an entity is removed. This will not be emitted in the observable.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.ToBooleanObservable(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.Func{NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.EntityState,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns a boolean observable that reflects the result of the provided predicate on the new state of the provided entity. Predicate will be evaluated on all state changes, including attribute changes. The observable is distinct until changed. A null entity state (typically received when an entity is removed) is filtered out so the predicate doesn't have to handle null values.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.ToBooleanObservable``3(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity{``0,``1,``2},System.Func{``1,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns a boolean observable that reflects the result of the provided predicate on the new state of the provided entity. Predicate will be evaluated on all state changes, including attribute changes. The observable is distinct until changed. A null entity state (typically received when an entity is removed) is filtered out so the predicate doesn't have to handle null values.

summary.para: Returns a boolean observable that emits true when the entity turns on and emits false when the entity turns off. Predicate will be evaluated on all state changes, including attribute changes. The observable only emits changes and will not emit the initial state. The observable is distinct until changed. Other state changes are ignored.
State changes other than on or off are ignored. This also includes a null entity state. This is typically received when an entity is removed. This will not be emitted in the observable.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.ToChangesOnlyBooleanObservable(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.Func{NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.EntityState,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns a boolean observable that reflects the result of the provided predicate on the new state of the provided entity. Predicate will be evaluated on all state changes, including attribute changes. The observable only emits changes and will not emit the initial state. The observable is distinct until changed. A null entity state (typically received when an entity is removed) is filtered out so the predicate doesn't have to handle null values.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.ToChangesOnlyBooleanObservable``3(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity{``0,``1,``2},System.Func{``1,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns a boolean observable that reflects the result of the provided predicate on the new state of the provided entity. Predicate will be evaluated on all state changes, including attribute changes. The observable only emits changes and will not emit the initial state. The observable is distinct until changed. A null entity state (typically received when an entity is removed) is filtered out so the predicate doesn't have to handle null values.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.LimitOpenDuration(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.TimeSpan,System.Reactive.Concurrency.IScheduler)
member.summary: Returns an observable that will automatically emit "false" if does not emit a closed (false) itself within after emitting open (true). This method takes into account EntityState.LastChanged, meaning the returned observable can emit "false" even if the time did not pass during runtime. Resulting observable is distinct.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.LimitOnDuration(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.TimeSpan,System.Reactive.Concurrency.IScheduler)
member.summary: Returns an observable that will automatically emit "false" if does not emit an off (false) itself within after emitting on (true). This method takes into account EntityState.LastChanged, meaning the returned observable can emit "false" even if the time did not pass during runtime. Resulting observable is distinct.

member.summary: Returns an observable that will automatically emit "false" if does not emit an off (false) itself within after emitting on (true). member.summary: Returns an observable that will automatically emit "false" if applied to the state of does not emit a "false" itself within after emitting "true". This method takes into account EntityState.LastChanged, meaning the returned observable can emit "false" even if the time did not pass during runtime. Predicate will be evaluated on all state changes, including attribute changes. Resulting observable is distinct.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.PersistOpenFor(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.TimeSpan,System.Reactive.Concurrency.IScheduler)
member.summary: Returns an observable that delays the first closed (false) that is emitted after an open (true) by for a duration of . Resulting observable is distinct.

member.summary: Returns an observable that delays the first "false" that is emitted after a "true" by applied to the state of for a duration of . Predicate will be evaluated on all state changes, including attribute changes. Resulting observable is distinct.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.OpenForAtLeast(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity,System.TimeSpan,System.Reactive.Concurrency.IScheduler)
member.summary: Returns an observable that won't emit "false" for at least after an initial open (true) is emitted by . If a closed (false) is emitted during the , it will be emitted immediately after the timer is completed. Resulting observable is distinct.

Resulting observable is distinct.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.Stateful(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity)
member.summary: Returns an observable that emits the entity's current state upon subscribing and will emit state changes where State.New != State.Old
member.remarks: As of NetDaemon version 25.5.0, the method StateChangesWithCurrent provides the same functionality.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.Stateful``3(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity{``0,``1,``2})

member.remarks: As of NetDaemon version 25.5.0, the method StateChangesWithCurrent provides the same functionality.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.EntityExtensions.StatefulAll(NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity)
member.summary: Returns an observable that emits the entity's current state upon subscribing and will emit all state changes, including attribute changes.
member.remarks: As of NetDaemon version 25.5.0, the method StateAllChangesWithCurrent provides the same functionality.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.ObservableExtensions.RepeatWhenEntitiesBecomeAvailable``1(System.IObservable{``0},NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity[])
member.summary: Returns an observable that emits the same result as the source observable, but will repeat the last result when one of the provided entities becomes available.

member.name: M:NetDaemon.Extensions.Observables.ObservableExtensions.RepeatWhenEntitiesBecomeAvailable``1(System.IObservable{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NetDaemon.HassModel.Entities.Entity})
member.summary: Returns an observable that emits the same result as the source observable, but will repeat the last result when one of the provided entities becomes available.
